txt.en: Shakal-atrâd can be found in central Elderslade.\n\nYou should find what remains of the scouting party and honour their sacrifice.
Return to Lóssi with the keepsakes
Lóssi can be found at Annâk-khurfu.\n\nYou should return to Lóssi with the keepsakes.

'A burned dwarf is a dwarf with honour. You have my thanks in this sad task that you set for yourself.\n\n'My thoughts have brightened with the news that you have returned with their keepsakes. Now their families will have something more than memories to hold.'
Shakal-atrâd can be found in central Elderslade.\n\nYou should find what remains of the scouting party and honour their sacrifice.
Burn the deceased members of the scouting party ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect keepsakes from the members of the scouting party ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

The old dwarf-ruins of Shakal-atrâd have been defiled by the forces of Gundabad for many years. Inside lies what remains of the Lóssi's lost scouting party. You know what you must do: honour them in any way that you are able.
The members of the ill-fated scouting party must be remembered and honoured for their heroics and sacrifice.
Burn the deceased members of the scouting party
